channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Darian Mensah Officially Joins Miami Hurricanes After Agreement With Duke
item.description: After settling legal battle with Duke, QB Darian Mensah has officially joined the Miami Hurricanes.

item.title: Men's College Basketball 2025-26 Undefeated Teams Tracker: Michigan Beats Nebraska
item.description: Here are the men's college basketball teams that are still undefeated in the 2025-2026 season.

item.title: Izzo: Michigan State 'Got Lucky' Vs. Rutgers, Must 'Learn' Before Playing Michigan
item.description: No. 7 Michigan State was 'lucky' to beat Rutgers, but the Spartans can learn from their mistakes ahead of playing No. 3 Michigan.

item.title: Super Bowl LX, NFL Buzz: Jon Gruden Not Interested in Jets' Job
item.description: Only four teams are still in the hunt for the Lombardi Trophy, but there's still plenty of news across the NFL.

item.title: Indiana Hands No. 12 Purdue 3rd Straight Loss
item.description: Indiana upset No. 12 Purdue as the Boilermakers lose a third straight game.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi clubs eye PSG's Dembele amid contract issues
item.description: The Saudi Pro League is "laying the groundwork" for a move for PSG star Ousmane Dembele.Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Rodman, Hayes viral celebration caps off U.S. rout
item.description: Trinity Rodman capped off the USWNT's 5-0 rout of Chile by coaxing coach Emma Hayes into a sideline dance, as a young American squad secured its fifth...

item.title: Nebraska's 24-game win streak ends vs. Michigan
item.description: Nebraska's improbable run, the longest in Division I since the 2014-15 Kentucky team went 38-0, came to a halt against the No. 3 Wolverines.

item.title: Wembanyama 'horrified' by Minnesota shootings
item.description: Spurs star Victor Wembanyama on Tuesday articulated his thoughts on a pair of fatal shootings by federal agents in Minneapolis, saying, "Every day I w...

item.title: 'Insane ...': Patrick Mahomes leads reactions to Belichick missing first-ballot Hall of Fame nod
item.description: The sports world was abuzz on social media after news that the legendary coach wouldn't be a first ballot Hall of Famer broke.
